column4: how to download and install xorg.deb from the terminal? My xserver is not loading since I upgraded to Edgy. Please help.
how to download and install xorg.deb from the terminal? My xserver is not loading since I upgraded to Edgy. Please help.
!xserver
what happens when you type startx
one minute wastrel
I will logout and relogin. A small problem
wastrel : X server is now disabled. Restart GDM when it is configured correctly
you need to fix your  /etc/X11/xorg.conf  file - do you have nvidia or ati?
wastrel : I have nVidia GeForce 6200
wastrel : so what should I do?
you should follow the nvidia howto - can you read web pages?
wastrel : I am using the terminal :(
you know how to switch to another virtual terminal?  alt-f2,    alt-f1, etc ?
yes wastrel
ok Shadok
yes, lynx or w3m  can open web pages.  and go to this link...
!nvidia | alanhaggai
thanks wastrel :)
I will check that
wastrel : it says that the webpage does not exist
!nvidia
how about  https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/Nvidia
